title: Hercules Beetle
summaries: The Hercules Beetle is a Hardmode, post-Plantera accessory that increases the damage of summon weapons by 15% and increases their knockback by 2. It is sold by the Witch Doctor for 40 GC if he is spoken to in the Jungle.

On the <linked>[img:Old-gen console version]</linked><linked> Old-gen console version</linked> and <linked>Nintendo 3DS</linked><linked>[img:Nintendo 3DS version]</linked><linked> version</linked>, the <linked>Pygmy Staff</linked> must be in the player's inventory in order for the Witch Doctor to sell the item.

statistics.Tooltip:
Increases summon damage by 15%
Increases the knockback of your minions
statistics.Buy: 40 GC
statistics.Sell: 8 GC
